76a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang myi dben zhes bya bar ma ngas su myi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces
76a6('bum): bya bar yongs su myi rtog gau/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang bzhin spong pa nyid sdu ga ces
76a7('bum): bya ba dang myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog na/

76b1('bum): yongs su myi rtog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ chos thams cad stong
76b2('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang myi stong zhes bya bar
76b3('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog gi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtag go/

76b5('bum): dang sti drug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang gi mtshan nyid tshu pa nyid bde nas bya ba dang sdug stsal zhes bya bar yongs su / go// rang gi mi tshan nying stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang bdag myed ces
76b6('bum): par yongs su myi rtog go// rang gi mtshan nyid song pa nyid skrag ces bya ba dang myi sdug cas bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rang gi mya tshan nyid stong pa nying song nas bya bar yongs su su rtog go// rang gi mtshan cid stong pa nyid mtshanam/ 
76b7('bum): sto nas pa ba dong mnanam myed ces bya bar yongs su su rtog go// rang gi mtshon nyid stong pa nyid spyon pa yang nas b+hAb+ha dang / smon pa skyed ces bya bar yongs su su rtog na/ rang gi dun cing stong ba nyid mi nas rlubargya mngam
76b8('bum): rgyas go// rang gi mtshan da stong po nyid da ben thos bya ba dang myi dben zhes bya bar yis su myi sa go// myi dmyigs pa stong btod dgaces bya bdang sbyin no ces bya ba yongs su su rtog gi/ myong rgyags pa slong pa shing / 
77a1('bum): zhes bya ba dang sug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba/

77a3('bum): ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang ma
77a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ myi dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang myi dben zhes bya bar yod/ sa su myi rtog go// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya/

77a6('bum): bya ba dang bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / 
77a7('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar yongasasu myi rtog go// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /

77b1('bum): yongs su myi rtog go// jicon stong pa nyid dag ces bya ba dang phyi drug ces bya byar yongs su myi dog go/ nga po nyidi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs sasusu na
77b2('bum): rdon nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bu dang bdag myed ces bya ba sa su tog go/ rje nyid stong pa nyid sdu ga ces bya ba dang / myo sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtag ga
77b3('bum): nyid sto zhes bya ba da kyi sno zhes bya ba mangs su myi dog no// stong banyid mtshan ma yong kyis 'dzin da myi ces phyi du la su rig+sa

78a1('bum): myi rtog go// ngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smyod pa myed ces bya bar yongs su m+b+hi rAg / dngas blo skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid sto
78a2('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mya rtog go/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar
78a3('bum): bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran
78a4('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang bdagra mye da ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar bzhi ga pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang myi sdug ces bya bar yongs

78a6('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran du nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon myed ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// dran pa nye bar bzhin
78a7('bum): pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams
78a8('bum): rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag
78b1('bum): myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// yang dag par spong pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi

79b1('bum): tshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ston pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag

81a1('bum): tha rang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su su rtog go// rnam par thard pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su su rtog go// rnam par thar pa

81a4('bum): yongs su myi rtog go// rnam par tha ra pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang // myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mthar kyis gan/ sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag
81a5('bum): ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sugasngal zhes bya bar yongs su su rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams pang/ 
81a6('bum): nas bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mthard kyis gnas pa'i
81a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod nas bya ba dang / mtshan ma meng ces bya bar yongs su myi ma
81a8('bum): go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sngon po yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma ni nas
81b1('bum): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mthar na kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnarnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa
81b2('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam par thar
81b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mi myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug ces bya
81b4('bum): ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam par thar/ pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa s+ho// nga pa nyid dang myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam par
81b5('bum): tha rang pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang ston pa meng ba mtshamam yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
81b6('bum): smon pa myed pa ston pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma/ yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam par tha
81b7('bum): pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi
81b8('bum): rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bong ga myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 
82a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog/ 
82a2('bum): go/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon par myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
82a3('bum): rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin nas
82a4('bum): rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sug stsal zhes bya/ par yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag
82a5('bum): ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya ba ra yongs su myi rtog ga go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes
82a6('bum): bya ba dong myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bye ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon
82a7('bum): pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ding nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya ba dang mya dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi non
82a8('bum): gzug kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ gzungs kyis rnams rtag
82b1('bum): ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces par yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong
82b2('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed
82b3('bum): ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su
82b4('bum): myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya 'i kyig nye bar yongs su myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs// rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs
82b5('bum): su myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / 
82b6('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams mtshan
82b7('bum): ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam ston pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ de bzhin
82b8('bum): gsheng gas pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar dang / mye dben zhes bya bar yongs su
83a1('bum): dog na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams nag cas bya ba dang / myin gces bya bar yongs su myi dog go// 'dzugs pa rnams pang nas bya ba dang thugs sa zhes bya ba yongs su nan/ 
83a2('bum): rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes ba yongs rtog go// hU~M 'jigs pa rnams panam yongs ba dang / mchims myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog / 'ji
83a3('bum): pa rnams ston pa yod ces bya ba dang / gyon pa snyid rdzas da / yongs su kyi rlig s+ho/ hU~M 'jigs pa rnams ni zhes bya dang / mni nas bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// ma / 
83a4('bum): pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya ba bar yongs su myi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces te/ ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// 
83a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
83a6('bum): dog / ba ma yang dag par rig po rnams sugacis bya ba dang / myi sug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog gas/ so so yang dag par tshig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi spong nas bya bar yongs
83a7('bum): su myi rten go/ so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod nas bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su su tog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bya dang
83b1('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar
83b2('bum): myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su/ 
83b3('bum): myi rtog go/ byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa chen po sdug ces bya rab dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams/ 
83b4('bum): pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mya dag go/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / man ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa tsham po
83b5('bum): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// byams pa chen po dbyen nos bya ba dang / 
83b6('bum): dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 
83b7('bum): snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// snying rje chen po stug ces bya ba dang / sug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang myi song
83b8('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon ma myed ces byed
84a1('bum): yongs su myi dog go/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// snying rje chen po dpon zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 
84a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ 
84a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'anges pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi
84a4('bum): rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba/ dang myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan
84a5('bum): ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni
84a6('bum): zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid rtag
84a7('bum): ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang
84a8('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs
84b1('bum): su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su
84b2('bum): myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rlom
84b3('bum): ba shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gri rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rnam pa shes pa
84b4('bum): nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi to ngag go// lam gri rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rnam pa shes pa/ 
84b5('bum): nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rnam pa
84b6('bum): shes pa sha nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// lam gi rnam pa shes
84b7('bum): pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
84b8('bum): bdo zhes bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
85a1('bum): mas bya dang/ thu sa byab smos su bzhan/ rnam pa gsas dam na nas tha nga byanapa nas brnamangs su / rnam pams cas bya mam
85a2('bum): d+hang+yas bya ba dang / mnan ma myed ces bye bar yongs su spyog go// rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyi nga ston pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myud ces bya bar yongs su ma rtog ga/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da
85a3('bum): ni zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// de ltar na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
85a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ chos 'di dag la de ltar yongs su myi rtog go// 'phags pa// shes rab
85a5('bum): bam po / te smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyirang de skad du gzugs kyi ma
85a6('bum): smras pa gang yin pa ni gzugs sa ran/ ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa ma na/ 'dugs kyis skyes pa byung skye dun drugs r+b+ban+tu/ sa smras klu na
85a7('bum): yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes par ma skyes pa yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ci'i phyir na de skad du myig gi ma skyes po gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ rna ba 'i/ 
85a8('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i ma skyes cag pa de ni snga ma yin/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lA ma yin/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang
85b1('bum): yin pa de ni yid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin/ dri'i ma skyes pa
85b2('bum): gang yin pa da ni dri ma yin/ ro'i me skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rom yin/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin/ nas zer/ tshe dang ldan par
85b3('bum): 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam
85b4('bum): par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par zhes pa pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma
85b5('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
85b6('bum): ci'i phyir na de skad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa ga yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa mo yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ 
85b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang
85b8('bum): yin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ nas zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ da skad du phyin
86a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa/ 
86a2('bum): de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
86a3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsherabu'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
86a4('bum): kyis tshor ba'i ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i maskyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ 
86a5('bum): sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ nu 'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi/ 
86a6('bum): khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par zhes pa
86a7('bum): ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa
86a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug go ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i mo skyes
86b1('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin/ lend pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lend pa ma yin/ 
86b2('bum): srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin/ rgashi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ 
86b3('bum): smon pa'i pha mang tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa deni sbyin po'i pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i ma
86b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ma rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
86b5('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skye sa pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin zhes
86b6('bum): zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir ni de skad du nang stong pa nyid kyi ma smras pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa/ 
86b7('bum): gang na pa ni byin mong shi sa yin/ nga bcid stong banyid kyim skyes pa gang yin pa snong pa nyid kyang ba sa yin/ rgan po song da tum skyes pa gang yin par ni/ rgan po stong ba nyid sa son/ de
86b8('bum): kha stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang seMn dang ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis smras pa gang mim
87a1('bum): pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa ga yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
87a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang / tha ma myed pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid da kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
87a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
87a4('bum): de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi dmyigs ba stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa s+ho// nga pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa/ 
87a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mi yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yi na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
87a6('bum): pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
87a7('bum): ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag/ bar spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po
87a8('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes/ pa gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan/ 
87b1('bum): lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'pha/ 
87b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i
87b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma yin
87b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
87b5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes par
87b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs
87b7('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
87b8('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po
88a1('bum): ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin zhes zer// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du thams
88a2('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
88a3('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba zer/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma
88a4('bum): yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong
88a5('bum): kha de ni tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tsher ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes
88a6('bum): kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni
88a7('bum): 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
88a8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// gang rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
88b1('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni myig gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na myig gi ma skyes pa gang
88b2('bum): yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba ma yin te skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
88b3('bum): rna ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna ni snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no// 
88b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce ni lce 'is stong ste/ gang stong pa de dani lce ma yan te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna/ dam grangs des na lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no// 
88b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dI ta 'i bu rnam grangase na lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma
88b6('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// 
88b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs
88b8('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra ni sgras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no// tshe dang
89a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri ni dris stong ste/ gang stong pa da ni dri ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro
89a2('bum): ni ros ste/ gang stong pa de ni ro ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rog ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs reg ni reg gis stong ste/ gang stong
89a3('bum): pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos ma yin/ 
89a4('bum): te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas
89a5('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu rnam grangs des na myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig gi rnam par shes pa ma
89a6('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rna ba'i rnam
89a7('bum): bar shes pa'i ma skyes pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin te skye ba myed do// 
89a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ 
89b1('bum): gang stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa da lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
89b2('bum): ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
89b3('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ 
89b4('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi
89b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshed nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
89b6('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ti'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// 
89b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg
89b8('bum): pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te rig pa ma yin no// 
90a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lnga'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lnga'i
90a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin
90a3('bum): te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi
90a4('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skyeb myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
90a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'du sa te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig
90a6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
90a7('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
90a8('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// 
90b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// 
90b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus
90b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i rnam grangs
90b4('bum): des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yind pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// de tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
90b5('bum): kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
90b6('bum): grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg
90b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
90b8('bum): na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
91a1('bum): sa'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams ni tshu
91a2('bum): khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams mi yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
91a3('bum): me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni me'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no// 
91a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis sto/ dang ste/ gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rlung gi khams kyi
91a5('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi sa stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed
91a6('bum): de/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs dras na/ nam mkha'i khams kyis skyes pa grang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// mdong ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu rnam pa shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i
91a7('bum): khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams
91a8('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des nam rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa
91b1('bum): ma rig pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
91b2('bum): 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
91b3('bum): des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mying dang gzugs
91b4('bum): ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grang nas des na mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mying ra dang gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched
91b5('bum): drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste// gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang
91b6('bum): yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ro dwa ti'i bu reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na reg pa'i ma skyes pa
91b7('bum): gang yin pa do/ reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni char ba ma yin te skye ba myed // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na tshor ba'i ma skyes pa
91b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sred pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang
92a1('bum): yin pa de sred pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lan pa ni len pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni len pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
92a2('bum): len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
92a3('bum): bu rnam grangs des na srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ska ba ni skye bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
92a4('bum): rnam grangs des na skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yi/ dan no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i/ 
92a5('bum): bu rnam grangs des na rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi mayin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
92a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ma yon te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa ma yin no// che dang ldan pa/ 
92a7('bum): ga 'i srams thoms kyi com kyi byonang pa ni rdus khrims kyi pa slong tu phyin pas song ste/ bang stong pa de ni tshul khams kyi pa'i mang tu bya pa sa yin te khye myod do// ngang ldan ga
92a8('bum): nam tha ma yin cul khrims kyi pa mau phyid pa'i mi stsal pa gang yin pa nas kyim kyi rob tu phyi pa sa med do// midang ldan pa bu pa'i ba tu
92b1('bum): tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa
92b2('bum): de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha
92b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin no// 
92b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nangad pa ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te skye ba
92b5('bum): med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang
92b6('bum): ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
92b7('bum): des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong tu ste/ gang
92b8('bum): stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi
93a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na phyi stong pa nyid phyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
93a2('bum): de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
93a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa
93a4('bum): pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid
93a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'ibu rnam grangs des na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
93a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes
93a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// 
93a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus stong pa nyid
93b1('bum): kyi snong steg gang stong pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i burnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tu ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas song ba'i
93b2('bum): ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
93b3('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las
93b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mtha' las wa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa dar dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma
93b5('bum): mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ljonapan ra dwa ti'i bu theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma
93b6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
93b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myong ba stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mi yin
93b8('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang
94a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin/ 
94a2('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rang gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
94a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
94a4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yi/ na te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des/ dan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rang
94a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// 
94a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni myi myigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
94a7('bum): kyis snying ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar d+hiti bru rnam grangs des na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mi skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
94a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma
94b1('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo
94b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed po myed ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
94b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
94b4('bum): des na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi me skyes pa gang yin pa de rlan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'idabu yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis
94b5('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spang ba rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par
94b6('bum): spong ba rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gi rkang po rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
94b7('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang
94b8('bum): po rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams ni stobs kyis stong ste
95a1('bum): gang stong pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
95a2('bum): dwa ti'i khru byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ grang stong ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
95a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong / 
95a4('bum): ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa/ 
95a5('bum): de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// tsha dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phag sde ba'i bden pa rnams ni 'phagaskyes pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni 'dags
95a6('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dI ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa/ 
95a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin te skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes/ 
95a8('bum): pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa/ 
95b1('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na tshad myang rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/ 
95b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis song ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'a
95b3('bum): ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong / 
95b4('bum): de ni rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma tI skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma yin no// 
95b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i
95b6('bum): snyems par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i smos
95b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon/ 
95b8('bum): pa myed pas stong ste/ gang steng pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ma yin te skye ba myong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong/ 
96a1('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
96a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na mngon par shes pa rnams
96a3('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te/ 
96a4('bum): skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na ting nge'i dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzind rnams ma rang yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ 
96a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi/ sgo rnams ma yin te skye ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
96a6('bum): ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
96a7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// 
96a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na myi 'jigs/ 
96b1('bum): pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni so so// 
96b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnas ma yin no// 
96b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin ni// skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byams pa chen po'i
96b4('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no// tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang
96b5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying / rje chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sas
96b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
96b7('bum): pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thams
96b8('bum): cacad shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi/ 
97a1('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lam gi naM
97a2('bum): ba shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de
97a3('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
97a4('bum): ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi
97a5('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi// 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shesaskye pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin// myig
97a6('bum): gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i 'gring ba gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin/ lus kyi 'phrig
97a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin// gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang
97a8('bum): yin pa de ni dri ma yin// ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin/ reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa/ 
97b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par/
