302a5('bum): tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang so/ pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas spyongad pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas / 
302a6('bum): pa nyid dang gdam tha' mas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba srung pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid srung ba nyi dang
302a7('bum): kyi hU~Ms pa / sa bgyid pa 'i pa / sa pa yongs gam pa dang / pa sa 'di ni/ 
302a8('bum): ba bzhi dang / dbang ba lnga dag / grobs lnga das khyod chu kyi lan lag bdu dang / phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa dang / lagags pa'i bden pa pani dag pasam gtan bane nga/ ma byu 'in
302b1('bum): gzugs srung ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba'i dang / rnam par b.rang ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo song pa nyid dang mtsham ma skyed pa dang smor pa myed pang / 
302b2('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
302b3('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag kyang bstan// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / chu 'phrul gi rkang rnam par brtse
302b4('bum): ngag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su
302b5('bum): nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gro bya ba dang / bkur
302b6('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum 'tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa
302b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chang par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sa
302b8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myang ba'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs dang / don dang rdzu
303a1('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
303a2('bum): yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa
303a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
303a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las/ 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
303a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams ca/ de stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
303a6('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bor bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pa
303a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar/ 
303a8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / myi 'jigs ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thes
303b1('bum): cang nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mI 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pam cwo brgyad dag kya
303b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa thams dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / chu 'phrul gi rnam pa rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhesar kyi pha rol dpa/ 
303b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par zhes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi 'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis
303b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang // bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod/ pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
303b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyuraro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa rtse/ 
303b6('bum): pa'i tshul gis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myang ba'i spobs pa dang / rgyan chang pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyamar
303b7('bum): bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa
303b8('bum): 'gyur ro// shes rab bam po / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung
304a1('bum): bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu bskyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
304a2('bum): phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rten kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
304a3('bum): zo stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba'i/ 
304a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang/ chos thas cad stong pa nyid dang / ra shi mtshan nyid dang pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa/ na nyid dang / ngo bo nyid mjib nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid
304a5('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa te bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
304a6('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
304a7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myong ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bani
304a8('bum): dngangos so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par zhes
304b1('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par/ 
304b2('bum): shes pa rnams la yongasu nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya
304b3('bum): dang bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam
304b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyamadapar bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag
304b5('bum): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pode ngag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa / rgyun chang pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sto
304b6('bum): pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spongs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang // 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyu ro// 'dus byas stong
304b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
304b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa / 
305a1('bum): sha nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
305a2('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa
305a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa kho zhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
305a4('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa
305a5('bum): brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
305a6('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das
305a7('bum): kha bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par zhes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi na pa rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te// des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
305a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gas
305b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
305b2('bum): las chos gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyurar kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa byed pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ 
305b3('bum): ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang
305b4('bum): 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'phags 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'phags shing / khyad zhugs// pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
305b5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba ba ste na to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i ba rig byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
305b6('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
305b7('bum): dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
305b8('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa ste/ 
306a1('bum): gnyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang ba dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs pa/ 
306a2('bum): dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam rtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
306a3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzinang
306a4('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
306a5('bum): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyangabastan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang stan
306a6('bum): tengs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sa te skye bar 'gyur 'os bya'o// des na mngon pa shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos
306a7('bum): can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rnying nas sangs rgyas kyi ning du 'do 'angadi dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'grod byu dang / bkur m+b+hi / du du
306a8('bum): dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bo de dag kyang / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gong thos pa de yang rnam po thams cad gi khyi tro na/ 
306b1('bum): thob lnga ma gyur kyi bar d+ha nam yang rgyan chad par myi 'gyur ro// bzhug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa skyed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub
306b2('bum): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa skyed pa'i spobs pa dang / kyi mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / 
306b3('bum): don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
306b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dadang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bsgred pa'i byang chub semasadad pa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
306b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas ma gtan gyi pha rol du phyi nang pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
306b6('bum): dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
306b7('bum): thog sa dang tha la myed pa stong pa nyid dang/ dang skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin song de nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ myi dbugs pa spong ba nyid dang/ byas
306b8('bum): dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / bo zhing snang pa nyid dang / dngos pa myed pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dang // drin pag bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang ba po ni dang / dbang ba/ 
307a1('bum): gdang spobs su dang / byang chub kyi sernams tsun dang / 'phags pa'i mam mnasag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bded pa pani dang / bsam gtan pa'i dang / tshad myed pa ba ni dang / gzugs myed pa'i sgoms/ 
307a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mthar kyis rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
307a3('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje/ 
307a4('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyu / dang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ da kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par brtse ba dag kyang
307a5('bum): bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yong su nyam pa
307a6('bum): myed pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod/ 
307a7('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang sa/ thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi
307a8('bum): nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i
307b1('bum): mul gis thogs pa srung ba'i spobs pa dang / rgyan tshang bskyed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bdag pa'i slos pa dang / rigs pa'i slobyas pa dang / bres pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i phungs pa dang / 'dzig cen
307b2('bum): thams cad mas mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// log ma dang sa ma myod pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan te
307b3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
307b4('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsamartan dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du
307b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
307b6('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stongs
307b7('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / khyang
307b8('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
308a1('bum): rnam par ra ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dag / mngon pa mashes pa 'a / 
308a2('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
308a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na bya
308a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pani
308a5('bum): chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang
308a6('bum): mchod par bya ba dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tho
308a7('bum): par ma gyu rad kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyuraro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
308a8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spo bos pa dang / rkun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i su
308b1('bum): bdongang su pa'i spos pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang mang ldan par 'gyur ro// dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
308b2('bum): rang 'a chen po yongasu bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di sa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byin
308b3('bum): pa dang 'thod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyir/ 
308b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
308b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong panyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang // chos thams cad stong panyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs
308b6('bum): ting dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang po bzhi dang
308b7('bum): dbang rdo lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
308b8('bum): byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / 
309a1('bum): mngon pa shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma so yang dag par rig pa bzhin
309a2('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bskam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mtsha mngon par zhes pa dag rngu 'bus gis
309a3('bum): rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par zhes pa rnams/ 
309a4('bum): la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsab gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba
309a5('bum): gdag pu dung du bya ba dang / tsho par bya bar 'dod pa de la dum dge ba'i che bdengs kyang thun su mtshogs par 'gyur ro// sa rgyas mnom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa des ma
309a6('bum): thams cing ma na pa ni bar sa gyud kyi rgyun ra kyim 9 man byu pa kyi'i dus gyis ga mas pa ba na gyu/ 
309a7('bum): sem sbya pa' sems dpa' chen ba ng+ges mye dmyigs pa'i tshus rgya tshogs btsung / ba skye ma stongs padang / mnyam s+yA ga/ gas pa'i sabs pa dang / 
309a8('bum): 'i sungs pa dang / dam ldan pa'i slongs 'dzig jig tan mas cangasapa pa zhis rgya chugs pa'i stobs pa dang yang ldan / yang na bya bya chu
309b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung bar bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nang sems bcu bskyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
309b2('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang
309b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po ste nga pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma mya
309b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhi/ na stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi ma datshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed/ 
309b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
309b6('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
309b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes/ 
309b8('bum): pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying
310a1('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ 
310a2('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur
310a3('bum): ro sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i sa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur ster bA ba dang / phyi drung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge tha'i
310a4('bum): rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas pa/ com ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad
310a5('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa skyed pa dang mnyam par bzhag par 'gyumed pa'i tshul gis kyang dag du mnyam par bzhug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshu
310a6('bum): gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chang pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs po dang / 'jig rten
310a7('bum): thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan
310a8('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyad pa'i bar byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
310b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
310b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
310b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag
310b4('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
310b5('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
310b6('bum): dgu dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed par smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad da // gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ngo // 
310b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna
310b8('bum): kyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// 
311a1('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gron
311a2('bum): bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu drung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos de yang rnam pa thams ca
311a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
311a4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i speb/ sa pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag da pa myed pa'i spobs pa myeng / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i
311a5('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
311a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu ba skyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
311a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid nga
311a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
311b1('bum): thong bang ga dang pa myed pa song pa nyid dang / rang gami nan cid stong pa nyid dag ting gi mi chen ning stong pa nyid dang/ byi dmyigs bya skyong ba'i dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngacanang myong ba nyi nga/ dam pa / 
311b2('bum): mi stong nyid dun bar banag pa ban hU~M/ dag par spong ba / d+hA rdza ky-i na sa / dbang po ste dang / mas pa dang / byo chub kyi yan lag 'du dang / phags pachims
311b3('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshang myong pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rang ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa
311b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dadang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par zhesadapa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dag gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
311b5('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen bo dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
311b6('bum): ngag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
311b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis
311b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ 
312a1('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyuraro// 'khrul pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu
312a2('bum): mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa
312a3('bum): dang rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa s+ho/ 
312a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi/ dngas su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu bskyed pa'i bar gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
312a5('bum): pha rold tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu'o/ phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
312a6('bum): tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
312a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myeng pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong ba
312a8('bum): dang/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
312b1('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rtsa brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa/ 
312b2('bum): bzhi dang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
312b3('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
312b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa lnga da dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub
312b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du
312b6('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya
312b7('bum): bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang / 
312b8('bum): rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i
313a1('bum): tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 
313a2('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang / yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung bar
313a3('bum): bsten to// sems dang po skyed pa nas sems bcu pa skyed pa'i bar gis byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
313a4('bum): phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyidang / 
313a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong ba nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha
313a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nga
313a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
313a8('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha
313b1('bum): pa'i brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug bya dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / 
313b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
313b3('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sem
313b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la/ yongs su nyam pa myed pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
313b5('bum): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod
313b6('bum): pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par
313b7('bum): myi 'gyur/ 'jug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang ga tu mnyam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen por dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa skyed pa'i spobs pa dang / 
313b8('bum): rgyun chang ba myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags zhing khyang
314a1('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu skyed pa'i bar
314a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
314a3('bum): de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / spyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
314a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dang stong pa nyid dang / rang
314a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / da ngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 
314a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi
314a7('bum): dang/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
314a8('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i
314b1('bum): dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par
314b2('bum): rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam
314b3('bum): pa myed pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba
314b4('bum): dang / mchod par 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
314b5('bum): thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyuraro// ga pa myong ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gis kya rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
314b6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chang ba myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang / 
314b7('bum): ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thas cad las mngon par 'phags shing zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu su
314b8('bum): bar bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i thor gi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rosangs phyin
315a1('bum): sa sa su sa sa rgya ma / phyi rna mamams na
315a2('bum): spong bzhid dang / rangangs pa myong banyid dang / 'dus byas song pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid da/ mtha' las 'das pastong panyid dang / thog sa da sa ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba skyed pa slong pa nyid
315a3('bum): slong ba nyid du/ chos thams cad srong po nyid dang / rang ga mtshan ninying stong ba nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa spyong panyid dang / dngos po myed pastong pa nyid dang ngas nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngos po myed pa'i nga ma nyid stong ba nyid dang dran pa ce
315a4('bum): banag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul nig rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi dan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dga'
315a5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam nyan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
315a6('bum): dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thas cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto/ 
315a7('bum): 'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems
315a8('bum): dpo' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par rtsa ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus
315b1('bum): zla bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par zhes pa rnams la yong sunam pa skyed pa'i chos can du'ar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi yi du 'dod 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bso/ 
315b2('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mos
315b3('bum): gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa myed pa'i tshul gis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par
315b4('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thogs pa myed pa'i spobs dang rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs
315b5('bum): pa dang rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thas cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par
315b6('bum): 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnas gtan rab 'byor
315b7('bum): kyis de ltar chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste bstan na/ de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ me tog mngon par sprul pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
315b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas rten rab 'byor de la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo// stong gsum gi sa
316a1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang tshangs
316a2('bum): ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan ga lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha dang / tshangs chen gi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang ga lha dang tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang chung dge
316a3('bum): ba'i lha dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i tshe lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha
316a4('bum): dang gya nom sAng tha'i lha dang / 'og myin kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa'i lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems dpar gyurar te/ de ltar gnas rten ra// ba 'byor kyis chos kyi char pa phab te bstan na/ de la bdag gis
316a5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog man da ra ba mngon par sprul par bya ste/ sangs rgyas poci ma ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
316a6('bum): rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas rgyun re ba 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bya'o rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo// des na lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gi stong
316a7('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgya mgyi na ga zhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtsho ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / 
316a8('bum): ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nyo phan gi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha dang / tshangs chen gi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad myongs ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / 
316b1('bum): chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang / myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i
316b2('bum): lha dang gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og myin kyi lha de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ lha rnams kyi me tog man da ra ba mang po mngon par sprul to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
316b3('bum): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas rtan rab 'byor nga la 'thor bar 'gyur// mngon par 'thor bar 'gyur ro// rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ro/ 
316b4('bum): me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong gsuMm gyi stong chen/ da po'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag me tog gis khengs par gyur nas/ steng gi bar snang la'ang me tog khang partsegs pa stong gsum gi stong
316b5('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas gnas rten rab la bye rang 'di snyam du sems dpar gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis
316b6('bum): mngon par rtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis snga 'chang lha'i gnas thams cad na yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni
316b7('bum): ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin thang las skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ying las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma/ 
316b8('bum): yin no snyam po dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis gnas gtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ming las byung ba ma yin no// ldum
317a1('bum): 6khru las byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bya los byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni ke'u shi ka de
317a2('bum): skaram skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no// brgya byin gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byorang me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zang ngam/ 'on tam gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba las byung / 'du zhes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma
317a3('bum): byung / rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ma yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad kyi/ ke'u shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka
317a4('bum): tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u da shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma/ yin no// ke'u shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'a
317a5('bum): byed ma yin no// ke'u d+ya shrI ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myig ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni myig ma yin no// ke shi ka rna ba ma
317a6('bum): byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sA ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba da ni sA ma ya na no// ke'u shi ka l+ye ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byuH
317a7('bum): ba de ni lus ma yin no// ke'u shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yang ma yin no// kenu zhi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung bye de ni gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sgra ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba den/ 
317a8('bum): sgra ma yi no// ke'u shi ka dro ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni dri m+ba yin no// ke'u shi ka ro nim byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni ri ma yin no// ke'u shi ka reg ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rig ma yin no// ke'u shi ka chos mi
317b1('bum): byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba
317b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sA'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni sA'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa
317b3('bum): yin no// ke'u shi ka lus kyi rnam par zhes pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no
317b4('bum): ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dusato reg pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung dab de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin
317b5('bum): ki'u ni sA'i 'dus te rog pa ni ma byung ste gang ma byung ba de ni sA'i sa te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka le'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ste gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mus
317b6('bum): te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa las rgyu
317b7('bum): ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ke ni ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
317b8('bum): ni ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sA'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste
318a1('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang mkhyung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin/ 
318a2('bum): ke'u ni ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// 
318a3('bum): ke'u shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka me'i khams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni me'i khams dam yin no// ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni
318a4('bum): rlung gi khams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba/ daste gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// ke'u shi kaR+kapar zhes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes
318a5('bum): pa'i khams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byung
318a6('bum): ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ ke'u shi ka mying dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// ke'u shi ka skye mched drug ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// ke'u shi
318a7('bum): ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni reg pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba ni tshor ba ma yin no// ketsu na ka sred pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni sreng pa ma yin no// ke'u ni ka mer
318a8('bum): ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba don len pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka srid pa ni ma thung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni srid pa ma yin no// ke mu ni ka skye bo nim byung ba ste gang ma byung ba don skyeb ma yin na/ ke chu shi ka rga shi ni ma byung / 
318b1('bum): keng me byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang
318b2('bum): mi byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
318b3('bum): tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 
318b4('bum): no// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang rang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
318b5('bum): ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni phyi stong par nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma skyes pa ste gang / ma byung ba de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid s+ho/ 
318b6('bum): pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba ste gleng ma byung ba de ni tshi na po stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma b+h+ya/ 
318b7('bum): ste gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni gang ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma
318b8('bum): byung ba de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni ma rgya
319a1('bum): ga ma byung ya so/ sa ma sa byed pa slong bzhing ma yin no// rba ni gdod bskyed pa song panyid nim kyang ldegs myam yang ngo srung ba slong pa nyid pa ma na/ gtsuni zhin mar
319a2('bum): ba stegapas byu de'i ni stong bzhing sa mi do// gtsun gachos thams cad skyongs nyid rnaMs byung ba ste gangs byung ba den chos rnams dang spong pa nyid ma yin no// ke rkyen ka ma can da slosrong ba zhid rnam
319a3('bum): m+mA la ma bya na gas ca da myong ba zhings yi do// chu ni ga myi dmyigs pa stong ba nyid dem byung ste gang ma byung ba don myi dmyigs pa srong pa nying sa yin no// seM zhig dam po myed pa rkang panyid rnam gyu
319a4('bum): ste gang ma byung don ngos po spyad pa song nyid ma ma da go ba nyid stong ba nyid ngam byung ba ste gang sa byung bdud khyon stong panyid ma yin no// tsug das po srung du myong bzhing ngam su
319a5('bum): ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nid stong pa nyid du/ yin no// ke'u zhika dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste / ngam byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no// keru shi ka
319a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// ke ru
319a7('bum): ka dbang po rnams ni ma khyung ba de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka stobs rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba
319a8('bum): de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// kelu ni ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rna
319b1('bum): ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan rnams ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ 
319b2('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rna
319b3('bum): tha rad pa brgyad ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a
319b4('bum): pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed/ 
319b5('bum): ba mye yin no// ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa rnams ni mi byung ba gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi kating nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni ting nge 'dzin dzA/ 
319b6('bum): ma yin no// ke'u ni ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rna
319b7('bum): bcu ma yin no// ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni myi bajigs pa bzhi ma yin no// ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin
319b8('bum): no// ke'u shi ka byams pa chen po ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba byams pa chen po ma yin no// ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po ni ma byung ba de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma byung ba ste ga
320a1('bum): ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong
320a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// ke'u shi ka phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// ke'u shri ka dgra bcom pa'i/ 
320a3('bum): nim byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rang byang chub ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rang byang chub ma yin no// ke'u shi ka lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni la/ 
320a4('bum): gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thamasadang mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams dang mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba skye
320a5('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no/ ke'u shi ka la na cig phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka phyir myi 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung
320a6('bum): ba de ni phyir myi 'ong ba ma yin no/ ke'u shi ka dgra bcom pa ni ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
320a7('bum): nimim byung ba ste gang ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di
320a8('bum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ ke ma gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di de ltar btags pa dang yang myi 'gal la chos nyid kyang bstan pa ni shes rab zab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal
320b1('bum): de bzhin no// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ gnas rten rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste de ltan btags pa dang yang myi 'gal la chos nyid kyang ston te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom
320b2('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gnas rten rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang myi 'gal la chos nyid kyang snyan pa lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
320b3('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de ni gnas gtan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// 
320b4('bum): shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yi ngan pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas rtan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal dar bstan to// ke'u shi ka 'du shes ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa

320b6('bum): 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis mye 'gal bar bstan to// karu ni ka de ci'i phyir na
320b7('bum): chos rnams kyis chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal lo// myi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal ba de gnas gtan rab 'byor kyis bstan te 'gal ba myed do// ke'u shi ka myig ni btags pa tsam mo// btag
320b8('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka rna ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de// de ni gnas rtan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gas
321a1('bum): bstan to// ke'u shi ka sA ni btags pa tsa mo/ btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de ni gnas gtan rab 'byord kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka lce ni btags pa tsam mo/ btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos

325b5('bum): gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de gnas nyan rab 'byor kyis myi lan/ la bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka byams pa chen po ni btags pa tsan mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de gnas rnam
325b6('bum): rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// keru ni ka stong rje chen po ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas rgan rab 'byokhyod kyis myi 'gal bar bstan te// tshun
325b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de// de ni gnas tan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// d+ya ni ka de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos dzas kyi
325b8('bum): ting la la gang yin pa ma myi 'gal rnas byar TI gal lo// gang myi 'gal namya par myi 'gal pa de gnas can ra 'gyu kyis bskrun ga pa myed do// skyen ni ga rgyun gyu zhugs pa'i 'bras d+h+ya nI ga
325b9('bum): mo// dgapa chem zhing min padzi gyi nyid de// den gnas nyan rab 'byor gyis myi 'gas par bstan to// kautsun gosan cin phyi'i ma ma thos bu cig kyi ba tsam mo// btags pa kyim ga sa
326a1('bum): ga/ deni chos nyid de de ni gnas rtan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// kenu shi ka phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bya ni btags bcom gang yin pa de ni chos ning de/ de ni gnas rkan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gral bar bstam to/ 
326a2('bum): ke'u shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni btags btsam mo btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/ 56/ 
326a3('bum): pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas
326a4('bum): rgan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni myi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal so// gang myi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal ba de gnas gtan rab 'byor kyi
326a5('bum): bstan te 'gal ba myed do// kelu ni ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni btags tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang min pa de ni chos nyid de// de ni gnas kye rkan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka lan cig
326a6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u ni ka phyir myi 'ong ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni
326a7('bum): chos nyid de de gnas rtan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas rten rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// tshun
326a8('bum): ka rang sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas tan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin
326b1('bum): rtsos nying ring ni gnas nan rab 'byor kyis myi 'gal bar bstan to// ke mu ni ka yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo btogs pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas nan rab 'byor kyis kyi
326b2('bum): 'gal bar bstan to// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni myi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal lo/ gang myi 'gal rnam par myi 'gal ba de gnas rkan rab 'byor kyis bstan te 'gal ba myed do/ 
326b3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar na gnas nyan rab 'byor ni btags pa dang / 'gal bar myi byed la chos nyid kyang bstan to// shes ra
326b4('bum): bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin na
326b5('bum): de de bzhin te// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam du bstan to// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos kyang de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig par bya ste/ 
326b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni gzugs la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs de yang
326b7('bum): pa re rjes su myi mthong ngo // tshor ba la myi spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'du shes la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par
326b8('bum): bya ba'i 'du shes de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'du byed la myi slob ste/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i 'du byed de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa la myi srab ste/ daci'i phyir rnyed/ 'dri
327a1('bum): des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni myig la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i/ 
327a2('bum): myig de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rna ba la myi slob ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sna la myi slob ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba/ 
327a3('bum): sA de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lce la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lce de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lus la myi slob ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par
327a4('bum): ba'i lus de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yid la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid de yang dag dbar rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
327a5('bum): ltar slob pa ni gzugs la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngas ka/ nga la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / sgra la myi sleb ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par
327a6('bum): bya ba'i sgra de yang dag par rje su myi mthong ngo // de la myi slob ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i di de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // ro la myi slob ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i ro
327a7('bum): de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // reg la myi sleb ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i reg de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chos la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i/ 
327a8('bum): chos de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni myig gi rnam par shes baM la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i myig gi rnam par nas
327b1('bum): de sang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba'i rnam par zhes pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi smom/ 
327b2('bum): deci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sna'i rnam par zhes pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lce'i rnam par shes pa/ 
327b3('bum): de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'
327b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes/ su myi mthong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sa
327b5('bum): pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag pa ra rjes su myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi slob ste/ de cin
327b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba'i dus te reg pa de yang dag par rje su myi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa de yang dag
327b7('bum): por rjes su myi mthong ngo / sde'i 'dus te reg pa la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngas gang ste bsreb par bya ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pas myi slob ste// de tso'i phyir/ 
327b8('bum): nenen 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sa myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang sa bas bya par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'o/ 
328a1('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i myig gri 'dus
328a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de yang dang /

328a4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de ya dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar
328a5('bum): ba la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi slob ste/ 
328a6('bum): de ci'i phyir med/ 'di ltam des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa'i ni sa'i khams la myi spong
328a7('bum): da'i phyir men/ di sbyar des gangs bsgru par tu 'di sa'i khams de yang dag par rdzas su myi mthong ngo // rgya'i khams sa myi slob ste/ tso'i phyir zhed/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i chu'i khams des pa
328a8('bum): mas khye ringag ma sal kyi ma / nga gro den/ ngas sa'i mas de sa masas la nga drug lan sa kyi na bya dzi
328b1('bum): gang la bslab par bya ba'i rlung gi khams de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // nam mkha'i khams la myi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i nam mkha'i khams de yang dag par rje su myi mthong
